title: Bug 124610: Add a filter on a boolean computed column will cause an error.
OB: When attempting to save and preview the application, an error occurs. The error message states: 'data.engine.ConvertToDataTypeError - org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Cannot convert <column name> to class java.lang.Boolean.'
EB: The filter should work correctly without causing any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the page or section where the filter on the boolean computed column is added.
2. Apply the filter on the boolean computed column.
3. Save and preview the application.
4. Observe the error message stating the inability to convert the column to class java.lang.Boolean.
